references.paper_title: Online convex programming and generalized infinitesimal gradient ascent
references.reason: This paper introduced the fundamental framework of online convex optimization (OCO), which is the foundation of the COCO problem studied in the current paper.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of the OCO framework and associated algorithms, which is crucial for understanding the context and related work of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Stochastic network optimization with application to communication and queueing systems
references.reason: This book introduced the drift-plus-penalty method, which is a fundamental tool in the analysis of constrained online optimization problems, and is applied in the current work.

references.paper_title: Online convex optimization with hard constraints: Towards the best of two worlds and beyond
references.reason: This paper presents state-of-the-art results on COCO, providing a benchmark for comparison with the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Online convex optimization for cumulative constraints
references.reason: This paper studies COCO with time-invariant constraints, providing insights into the challenges and techniques used to tackle the problem.
